title: Academic Excellence
desc: Currently maintaining a strong academic record with a CGPA of 3.92, on the scale of 4, reflecting dedication and consistent performance.

title: Problem Setter – Programming Contest
desc: Worked as a problem setter in the IUBAT Monthly Programming Contest – July 2025, organized by the Department of CSE, IUBAT.

title: International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC) – Participation
desc: Qualified for ICPC regional rounds, and ranked 64th.

title: Manager, Programming Club, IUBAT IT Society
desc: Volunteered as the Manager of the Programming Club to facilitate the programmers in my 4th year of BSc.

title: Trainer – Problem Solving & Programming Sessions
desc: Volunteered as a trainer for Problem Solving sessions (Basic & Intermediate) in several semesters.

title: Edge Training Program – Machine Learning
desc: Completed a Machine Learning course under the Edge Training Program, enhancing foundational and practical knowledge in AI.

title: DUET IUPC 2025 – Participant
desc: Achieved 46th position in the DUET Inter University Programming Contest 2024.

title: BUET IUPC 2024 – Participant
desc: Secured 52nd position in BUET Inter University Programming Contest 2024.

title: IUT IUPC 2024 – Participant
desc: Achieved 29th position in IUT Inter University Programming Contest 2024.

title: UAP Collaborative IUPC (Junior) – Participant
desc: Ranked 7th in the UAP Collaborative Junior IUPC.

title: National Collegiate Programming Contest (NCPC) – Participant
desc: Participated in JU NCPC 2024 and placed 136th nationally.

title: NULL
desc_commented: Was a part of the Organizing team of IUBAT IUPC in 2025 organized by the Department of CSE, IUBAT.
